Text.Page:
The Black Claw keeps us from our usual hunting grounds. Now we must fight {@LinkCreature:41#4001#ravenous basilisks} for every bite we eat. Every day they kill more of our hunters.

The Decurion says you are a great hunter. Will you take on the task of thinning out the basilisks for us?
Look at the size of that tusk! This basilisk would have killed many of us. We are grateful, <PCNAME>.
The {@LinkCreature:41#4001#ravenous basilisks} are a great danger to us, or we wouldn't have asked for your help.
